full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB LAM GCOD KYI MAN NGAG SNYING GI MUN SEL RIN CHEN SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES ZAB LAM GCOD KYI MAN NGAG SNYING GI MUN SEL RIN CHEN SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MKHYEN PA BRTZE BA SOGS @018B YON TAN DU MAS THUGS RGYUD PHYUG PA SKU MDUN DAR HAN MKHAN POS BSKAL BZANG YON TAN DANG, MCHOD DPON SDE DRUG MKHAN PO BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS YUL SKYID GRONG GI RI KHROD PA YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN POR SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
